verbose_text: Genetic deletion of IL-17 caused a significant increase in the number of BrdU + cells double labeled for both the specific marker of immature neurons (DCX) at 2 weeks after BrdU injections and mature neurons (NeuN) in the SGZ / GCL compared to WT animals at 4 weeks after BrdU injections (XREF_FIG).
evidence: IL-17 caused a significant increase in the number of BrdU
